text: The 2014–15 Burundi Ligue A season (known as the Amstel Ligue 2014–15 for sponsorship reasons) is the top level of competition in Burundi. It began on 19 September 2014 and concludes on 3 January 2015. A total of 16 clubs participate in the 2014-15 Ligue A. ==Teams== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Team ! Location ! Stadium !
